name: Taobao XX | 淘宝助手
description:
禁用淘宝页面推荐模块（掌柜推荐、看了又看、人气推荐、给我推荐等）
提高页面加载速度
简化页面，更清爽，浏览商品无干扰
对淘宝网、天猫网、阿里旅行、95095医药、天猫国际、1688有效
css:
@-moz-document domain("taobao.com"),
domain("tmall.com"),
domain("95095.com"),
domain("tmall.hk"),
domain("alitrip.com"),
domain("1688.com")

{
#ald-skuRight,
#J_SellerInfo,
#J_chaoshiService,
#J_SaleCombo,
#J_DcTopRightWrap,
#J_DcBottomRightWrap,
#J_TmallApkRateTab,
#J_QualificationTab,
#J_TabRecommends,
#J_DcFt,
#J_tm_fixtm531,
#J_shopkeeper,
#J_shopfeature,
#J_shopkeeper_bottom,
#J_Pine,
#tad_first_area,
#detail-recommend-viewed,
#detail-recommend-bought,
#detail-recommend-linjiahaohuo,
#J_TbShopActivityList,
#J_AsyncDCMain,
#J_Pinus_Enterprise_Module,
#J_GlobalRobotEntry,
#rrq,
#J_flowActQrcode,
#J_RecommendShop,
#J_RecommendMatch,
#interested,

.mui-mbarp-qrcode,
.tm-qrcode-icon,
.sn-mobile,
.tm-Right-Recommend,
.tm-layout,
.J_guess-you-like,
.index-mod__ems-ad___3fP6L,
.m-guess-you-like,
.m-someone-like-you,
.s-message,
.s-module-rightp4p,
.s-module-groupbuy,
.m-hot-buy,
.downapp,
.sm-qrcode,
.s-module-keywordsrank,
.s-module-bottomp4p,
.sm-zhaohuoshenqibanner,
.face-detail-recommend,
.app-offerDetailContext4,
.app-offerRecommend,

[data-title="无线二维码"],

}
